column5: Great house for Super Bowl Week! $1,200 per night. Three night min. please. $1,500 refundable deposit required. 50% Non refundable payment to secure rental and the balance in full when you arrive. \r \r 2000 square feet home \r Three Bedrooms \r Two Full Baths \r Master Bath w/Jacuzzi Tub \r Two Living Areas \r Two Eating Areas \r Dining Space for up to 12 People \r Sleeps Eight comfortably - Nine if you use the front living room sofa \r Big Screen Television \r Full Cable Service \r Free Long Distance Phone Calls \r WI-FI \r Full Size Washer/Dryer \r Fully Stocked Pantry and Fridge. \r Party Package Avialable Upon Request = Garage Refrig. filled with Beer/Wine etc. Additional Charge. \r Ride to and from Stadium on Game Day Included for up to Nine People if you Rent for the Entire Week. \r Smoking Allowed Outside Only\r Sorry, No Pets \r \r
